name: NeonBeat
description:
Team Name TeamNeonBeat

Gameplay Mouse and WASD or gamepad. Shoot incoming enemies and pickup their drops to improve your damage and the beat

Which Special Categories would you like your game to be considered for?

None of the Above

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission. We used some game jam toolkit assets.
